Uses of Interface
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.QueryBuilder

Packages that use QueryBuilder
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml Parser that produces Lucene Query objects from XML streams. 
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.builders XML Parser factories for different Lucene Query/Filters. 
 

Uses of QueryBuilder in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml
 

Classes in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml that implement QueryBuilder
 class CoreParser
          Assembles a QueryBuilder which uses only core Lucene Query objects
 class CorePlusExtensionsParser
          Assembles a QueryBuilder which uses Query objects from Lucene's sandbox and queries modules in addition to core queries.
 class QueryBuilderFactory
          Factory for QueryBuilder
 

Methods in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml that return QueryBuilder

Methods in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml with parameters of type QueryBuilder

 void CoreParser.addQueryBuilder(String nodeName, QueryBuilder builder)
